This Zulip server is currently experiencing some technical difficulties. Sorry about that!

The page will reload automatically soon after service is restored.

this happened after server restart
This Zulip server is currently experiencing some technical difficulties. Sorry about that!

The page will reload automatically soon after service is restored.
2 messages were moved here from #issues > cannot change message content while changing stream by Alya Abbott.
@David Nganga read https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/troubleshooting.html; you'll need to provide some server logs so that others can help investigate the problem.
